column2: an A.M. Eatery////As for the sweet potato pancakes
column3: the dish was given in a portion of 2 pretty large pancakes
column4: completely doused in a buttery warm caramel sauce and glazed pecans. The pancakes were actually extremely delicious
column5: and cooked to a consistency that was a little gooey and underdone in a way that paired well with the rest of the components. However
column6: I couldn't really eat more than half a pancake without feeling my blood sugar shoot through the roof
column8: it definitely made for a great addition to the brunch.
